bio:
Stalf, a Nord man, is vampire and a member of the Volkihar clan of vampires.
Stalf resides in Castle Volkihar. In the feud between fellow Volkihar vampires Orthjolf (a Nord man) and Vingalmo (an Altmer man), Stalf sides with Orthjolf and is loyal to him, while still ultimately being subservient to Lord Harkon, the ruler of the Volkihar clan.
name: Stalf
